definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: of the city of Sihon king of the Amorites Nu 21:26, Nu 21:27, Nu 21:28, Nu 21:30, Nu 21:34, Nu 32:3 (all E); De 1:4, De 2:24, De 2:26, De 2:30, De 3:2, De 3:6, De 4:46, De 29:6, Jos 9:10, Jos 12:2, Jos 12:5, Jos 13:10, Jos 13:21, Jos 13:27 (all D) Ju Jdg 11:19, Je 48:45, Ne 9:22; captured by Israel who dwelt in it Nu 21:25 (E) Ju Jdg 11:26; rebuilt by Reuben Nu 32:37 (E), given to Reuben at the division of the land Jos 13:17 (P); on the border of Gad, Jos 13:26 (P), it subsequently fell to Gad and was assigned to Levites out of that tribe Jos 21:39 (P) 1Ch 6:66; the Moabites gained possession of it Is 15:4, Is 16:8, Is 16:9 and subsequently the Ammonites Je 48:2, Je 48:34, Je 48:45, Je 49:3; it was celebrated for its fish ponds Ct So 7:5.—Mod. Ḥusbân, Seetzen:Reisen i. 407 Rob:BR i. 551 BD:Pal 191 Survey:EP 8.
